name: Fuera de Control
description:
Top-Down shooter made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
Theme: Out of Control

Intepretation: Player movement is out of your control. 

Your ship has been wrecked in space, and you must battle aliens for your survival while keeping your pawed companions safe!

Authors: Ivan, Jorge, Mario

Game Source Code: https://github.com/Jorge-Q/GMTK-2020-Game-Jam-Entry
